channel.title: Balamodini Children's Stories in Sanskrit (1994 to 1999)
channel.description: A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/bAlamodinI-01, with description: Sanskrit stories read by Samskrita Bharati volunteers from the Sambhashana Sandesha Sanskrit Magazine (1994-1999)..
channel.itunes:subtitle: Balamodini Children's Stories in Sanskrit (1994 to 1999)
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/bAlamodinI-01, with description: Sanskrit stories read by Samskrita Bharati volunteers from the Sambhashana Sandesha Sanskrit Magazine (1994-1999)..
channel.itunes:author: podcast.bharati@gmail.com
